file_content.text: What I would have given to witness Master Cerik's downfall. Excellent work!
Lord Gravus expects you to lead our final attack. Regretfully, I can't join you--my duty's here, wiping out any resisting Cathar.
Head to the Republic outskirts, meet Lord Shaythin. When flames and evac shuttles choke the skies, I'll know you've crushed the Republic base.
The Republic's down to their final defenses. Wish I could join you on the front lines.
I intercepted Bashun's final transmission. Magnificent work.
His death was gratuitous but effective. The Cathar are abandoning their homes in terror.
Violence is always persuasive.
And the results speak for themselves.
I've never seen such a strong warrior broken so fast. The Cathar listened to him. They're fleeing Taris.
The less Republic minions on this planet, the better.
Good riddance.
And now with the Cathar weakened, the way's open for our final offensive.
Bashun didn't go down easy.
I know. Bashun broadcasted his defeat across Taris. I recorded a copy for Imperial records.
Don't keep my heroics secret.
I'll include every detail in my report.
There you are!
Three meters of durasteel! That's what I cut through to escape my cell!
I hope the time alone taught you patience and charm.
Learn your lesson?
Oh, I'm all reformed. Going to celebrate by cutting you in half!
I like a woman who can bounce back from certain doom.
[Flirt] How resilient of you.
You dare talk to me like that after the stunt you pulled!
The Emperor's calling, Thana. I really should take this.
Shut up. [End call]
Don't even think about cutting me off!
Didn't mean any harm.
Apologies won't cut it. Next time I see you, you're dead!
What was that, Thana? Your transmission... it's--it's breaking up.
Much better. I've heard enough of her ranting.
Bashun's claimed too many Imperial lives. It's time he paid.
I'll contact Thana. We'll need everyone to take down the Cathar's leader.
Don't bother, Farvin. I'm here. And we never should have waited.
Drop the attitude. We have to hit Bashun now--before the Republic rearms the Cathar.
Just tell me where their leader's hiding.
I'll do it.
Bashun's protected by heavy security, installed after our failed assassination attempt. Lost my top commandos that day.
Sounds like a job for the Imperial infantry.
Send your troops after him.
They're tied up in the field. Besides, this operation demands expertise.
I'll slay every last Cathar.
If that's your method, so be it. But don't expect an easy fight.
Bashun's death will cost you.
Kill him and the bounty's yours. But be careful.
Bashun's earned his rep killing Imperials, Mandalorians, Sith--and that's when we took him by surprise.
Now he's entrenched in a Republic base, building his defense. Only the Empire's best can take him down.
I'm the best there is. Leave Bashun's death to me.
I'll take on the Cathar's leader myself.
No. Bashun's mine.
Our combined power will wipe the Cathar off Taris.
We're more powerful as a team.
Wise call, my lord. I suggest you take the lead. Thana, provide backup.
With my firepower, your lightsaber... the Cathar don't stand a chance.
We should work together.
Agreed. You should take point. Thana, provide backup.
Not a chance. I'll slay this Cathar before you step inside his base.
Actually, I'm the best.
You must be joking. I'll slay this Cathar before you even reach his base.
She's beyond my control. See that Bashun's killed, and don't let Thana compromise the mission.
I took out the Cathar's weaponry. They're defenseless.
Don't try taking all the credit. I smashed more than my share of munitions.
Excellent work--both of you.
Then the mission's a success. Good work--all of you.
I'm surprised, Thana. You didn't kill enough Cathar to win your own challenge.
Impossible! I cut down every beast I saw.
You lost. Deal with it.
Spare me the drama.
Give me what's owed.
Fine. Take this.
You were foolish to compete with me, Thana.
I win every contest I enter.
Shut up. Take this, before I change my mind.
Though I'm sorry you didn't kill enough Cathar to win Thana's little game.
Not even close.
My attention was focused on the Cathar's weapons.
I was busy with our targets.
Likely excuse.
Watch it, Thana.
So sensitive. No wonder you lost.
Let's stick to the mission.
Don't change the subject!
Don't let Thana hog the glory. Strike the Cathar's camps, destroy their munitions.
Glad you could join our fight. I'm General Farvin.
Darth Gravus spoke highly of you, my lord. Perhaps you can show these Mandalorians how the Sith win a fight.
Most of your record's classified, but what Darth Gravus showed me is impressive. I'll take strong Imperial stock over these brutish Mandalorians any day.
Darth Gravus assures me you're the most lethal Mandalorian he's seen. Perhaps you can show these other mercs how to fight.
Darth Gravus tells me you're the best merc on Taris. Maybe you can teach these blasted Mandalorians how to fight.
Darth Gravus told me of your exploits. These Mandalorians should take a page from your book.
We brought them here to help slay the Cathar, wipe the Republic off Taris.
But the Mandalorians are sloppy, no respect for a clean victory. To rout the Cathar, we need good old-fashioned Imperial might. And you, of course.
The Republic's allies don't stand a chance.
The Cathar are doomed.
True. But breaking their resistance is proving difficult.
You dare insult the legendary warriors of Mandalore?
Respect the Mandalorians.
Sincerest apologies, hunter. Your esteemed order is absolutely necessary to crush the Republic resistance.
How is your attack proceeding?
We've hit a wall. Our mission was to scorch this entire district. Now the Republic's allies are fighting back.
I'll crush these Cathar without Imperial interference.
I don't need your help.
Your confidence is inspirational--but even you will need backup.
Cathar settlements cover this part of Taris. They're defending their homes under the leadership of a feral warrior.
His name's Bashun. Some call him ferocious, brutal, terrifying. I say he's a dirty alien who needs to be put down.
I have experience taking out Republic pawns.
Allow me.
Commander Orda, Master Sulan--I heard. But this Cathar's a wily one.
I suggest you keep the alien-bashing to a minimum.
Watch your tone, human.
I wasn't referring to you--just these blasted Cathar. They're filthy beasts, especially the leader.
How do you intend to kill him?
I had an attack plotted. Everything was set. But that Cathar was ready for us.
So put him down already.
Bashun escaped our assassination attempts. Now he's deeply entrenched with state-of-the-art weaponry. Gifts from the Republic.
I've got a gift of my own. Killed another ten of the Cathar's best. Few more and I can make a coat.
What did I say about following me? Clear off or I'll pluck that lightsaber from your dead body.
You plant a tracer on me, Imp? I warned you--stop following me or you're dead!
Enjoy nipping at my heels, merc? Stop following me, or you'll lose an arm.
You're following me again? I told you--steer clear or I'll cut you in half!
You're about as interesting to me as the Tarisian wildlife.
Don't flatter yourself, Thana.
Your potential is enticing, Thana. There's much I can teach you.
[Flirt] I can't help myself.
I've heard that line before. The Sith who tried it are dead.
I'm here on business. Intelligence doesn't care about you.
Don't flatter yourself, Thana.
It's my business to keep my eyes open. It's my pleasure to keep them on you.
[Flirt] I can't help myself.
Keep it up and it'll be my pleasure to blind you.
I go where the job takes me.
Don't flatter yourself, Thana.
I can see right through your lies.
You're too beautiful not to hunt, Thana.
[Flirt] I can't help myself.
Try to catch me, and I'll gut you.
You're all bark and no bite.
I'm going to enjoy proving you wrong.
Try me, and I'll cut you down.
Your overconfidence will be your downfall.
Stop! Take your anger out on Bashun. But first, we must pull down his defenses.
Republic munitions are stockpiled at his camps, defended by the Cathar's best warriors. Republic combat droids, too.
Without those weapons, the Cathar--and Bashun--are vulnerable. We need to take them out now.
Bashun will soon be weaponless.
I'm in.
This mission's too important to let you mess it up. I'm going as well.
Maybe I can wipe them out.
Not up to it? Don't fret--I'm going after the weapons, too.
Let us see who can exterminate more of Bashun's best warriors. I'll bet my pay that you lose.
There's no doubt who's the better Sith, my lord. Devastate the Cathar's weapons, put Thana in her place.
Make the Empire proud, sir. Destroy the Cathar's weapons, and good luck topping Thana's body count.
You going to take that from her? Beat Thana at her own game, crush the Cathar's weapons.
I'll smash their munitions, but not now.
It can wait. [Refuse quest]
Don't bother coming back. I'll destroy them myself.
This isn't a solo operation. Alert me when you're prepared.
This land's thick with Cathar. Watch your head out there.
